name: clarify_chips_v1
purpose_en: Generate a strict clarify-chips contract (context + comfort) for the inline refine UI.
safety_notes_en: No medical/legal/sexual guidance; output only short localized labels. No disclaimers.
system: You output ONLY valid JSON matching the required contract. Labels must be in the SAME language as the intent. Keys must be short ASCII slugs (a-z0-9_). Keep labels short. Do not include any markdown or HTML.
user_template: Intent (redacted): "{{intent}}". Domain: {{domain}}. Intent language: {{intent_lang}}. UI locale: {{ui_locale}}. Days: {{days}}. Task: infer the best template_key (stable, slug-like). Build sections for context and comfort (type "single"). Each section has up to 4 options and a default key from its options. Provide short labels (<=32 chars) and option labels (<=26 chars). Output JSON ONLY with this shape: {"template_key": string, "prompt_version": "clarify_chips_v1", "lang": string, "days": number, "sections": [{"id":"context"|"comfort","label": string,"type":"single","options":[{"key": string,"label": string}],"default": string}]}
